"Cauldron Probe":
"Your task is to explore the caves known as
the Cauldron within the crust of Amduskia.

You are free to search the Cauldron at will.


----------------------------------------
You will fail if you lose the final battle."

"惑星アムドゥスキアの地殻に存在する
洞窟内の調査が目的となる。

火山洞窟を各位、自由に探索せよ。

失敗条件/最深部での敗北"
